main event: A rancher in Keene, North Dakota, observed a UFO resembling a light bulb on the night of November 8, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10 seconds traveling in a NE course at an estimated altitude of 2500-3000 feet., The object was smaller than an 8-52 aircraft and brightly illuminated., The sighting was made by children who were later joined by the rancher, George Tank Jr., The rancher was deemed a reliable observer due to his background with NIMIL Defense and familiarity with aerial activity., The object made no sound and was seen passing about 2 miles from the observer's location.
